paragraphs.body: A vast range of flora grows in the ${link_0}, varying greatly from place to place depending on climate and conditions.
section: Flora in the World of Avatar
paragraphs.text: A vast range of flora grows in the World of Avatar, varying greatly from place to place depending on climate and conditions.

paragraphs.body: There are several distinct habitats in the Avatar World, each suitable for different species and variations of plants.
section: Flora in the World of Avatar
paragraphs.text: There are several distinct habitats in the Avatar World, each suitable for different species and variations of plants.

paragraphs.body: Due to its humid air, the ${link_0} is home to a large number of plants, which are all densely packed into the area together with the other organisms that live there.
section: Flora in the World of Avatar
paragraphs.text: Due to its humid air, the Foggy Swamp is home to a large number of plants, which are all densely packed into the area together with the other organisms that live there.

paragraphs.body: Due to the ${link_0} and ${link_1}'s ${link_2} and low temperatures, flora in these parts can only grow underwater, excluding the plants around the warm center of the ${link_3}.
section: Flora in the World of Avatar
paragraphs.text: Due to the Northern and Southern Water Tribe's arctic climate and low temperatures, flora in these parts can only grow underwater, excluding the plants around the warm center of the Spirit Oasis.

paragraphs.body: The ${link_0} holds the driest, hottest climate of the world. The desert's ecosystem primarily consists of cacti in terms of flora.
section: Flora in the World of Avatar
paragraphs.text: The Si Wong Desert holds the driest, hottest climate of the world. The desert's ecosystem primarily consists of cacti in terms of flora.
